body.name: CIVAGO 32 oz Glass Water Bottle with Straw and Handle, Large Sports Motivational Water Bottle Flask with Time Marker and 2 Lids, Leakproof Water Jug Canteen with Silicone Sleeve for Gym,Sage…
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 1 min
features: 【TRACK HYDRATION & TIME MARKER DESIGN】CIVAGO glass water bottle comes with time markers and exact volume on the side so you can see your daily hydrated intake and stay on track meet your health and fitness goals, nudge you getting into healthy habit of drinking water.

【HALF GALLON CAPACITY WATER BOTTLE】CIVAGO large water bottle ensures you enjoy enough water without having to refill it frequently. This large water jug is perfect for an on-the-go lifestyle! Our 32 oz and 64 oz two-size glass water bottles with straw that meet your different hydrating need.

【TWO DIFFERENT LIDS DESIGN】CIVAGO motivational water bottle is equipped with 2 leakproof and durability wide-mouth lids, 1 flip-up straw lid and 1 easy-twist spout lid, All caps allow for easy one-handed or hands-free sipping when you are busy or on-the-go.

【GLASS WATER BOTTLE WITH SILICONE SLEEVE】CIVAGO big water bottle for easy to carry and use. CIVAGO has designed the silicone sleeve for the glass water bottle. , the color of the silicone sleeve varies and stylish， provides impact protection, easy grip, no slips and reduced condensation. Enjoy the happy hour of drinking water.

【SUITABLE OCCASIONS】CIVAGO aesthetic glass water bottle with straw to drink can be used at home as a daily water intake bottle and can be taken to work to solve the problem of not drinking enough water. CIVAGO wide mouth water jug can be used as a motivational water bottle for the outdoors, gym sports, travel, picnic, etc. We hope CIVAGO glass water bottle can accompany you to more places you want to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like the fact that it’s a glass bottle and it's portable. I've been drinking filtered water from plastic bottles for a long time. It's time for a change, and I hope it will start making a difference. It's good quality water in a good quality drinking bottle. It also has a water and time indicator on the bottle, so I can ensure I drink enough water to stay hydrated.I love this product. It's a good-quality material, and it comes in beautiful colors. I would highly recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Sustainable Hydration!
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to this glass water bottle, and I’m thrilled with my purchase. The sleek design and durable glass make it a stylish accessory for any occasion. I appreciate the eco-friendly aspect of using glass, reducing my reliance on plastic.The silicone sleeve provides a comfortable grip and adds an extra layer of protection. The wide mouth makes it easy to clean and fill, and the leak-proof cap gives me peace of mind, especially when tossing it into my bag on the go.Overall, this glass water bottle has become my go-to for staying hydrated in a sustainable and chic way. If you’re looking for a reliable and environmentally conscious hydration companion, I highly recommend giving this bottle a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I decided to go the glass route in drink water from a water bottle. I like the size and weight of the bottle and the additional top an accessories that came with. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't know that I needed this.
reviews.reviewText: The bottle is attractive and well protected from breakage. But it is marked for daily control of water intake! I didn't know that I needed this. But day one I doubled my water intake! Love it! Lots of great accessories too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this bottle. The reason why it's not a 5 stars is because of quality. But really can't beat it for $17Pros:- Light weight- easy to clean- no leaks- comes with cleaning tools- comes with 2 different caps, 1 to use with straw. I really like that it gives you the option to drink without the straw- nice protective silicone sleeveCons:- because it is light. The glass is very thin. I kind of have to baby it because I don't want to break it- although it comes with the silicone sleeve, the sleeve is very thin- the handle seem to be cheap and can break easily. But time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and safe
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with my beautiful new glass water bottle with motivational time stamps!! It not only came with TWO different style lids and TWO straws, but also TWO cleaners… a large sponge bottle cleaner and a straw cleaner! I will absolutely be buying more of these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and practical
reviews.reviewText: I drink a lot of water during the day with this one I fill it up twice instead of using 7 or eight other glass bottles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointing Experience with CIVAGO 64 oz Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the CIVAGO 64 oz Glass Water Bottle, attracted by its large capacity and the motivational time marker. However, my experience has been far from satisfactory.Firstly, the bottle's durability is questionable. Within a week of gentle use, I noticed small cracks developing near the base. This makes me question the quality of the glass used.The usability is another concern. The bottle is quite bulky and heavy, especially when full. Carrying it around during my gym sessions is more of a workout than a convenience. Additionally, the straw provided is flimsy and bends easily, making it difficult to drink from.The design, while initially appealing, has its flaws too. The silicone sleeve, meant to provide grip, keeps slipping off, and the two lids option is more confusing than helpful. I've had instances where the lid wasn't secure enough, leading to leaks in my gym bag.Lastly, for its price, I expected better quality and functionality. There are cheaper bottles in the market that offer better durability and practicality.Overall, I regret this purchase and cannot recommend the CIVAGO 64 oz Water Bottle. It's a classic case of style over substance, failing to deliver on its basic promise of durability and convenience.
